## (Variational) Auto-encoders
   
#### Highly non-linear model

Find $\Phi$ and $\tilde\Phi$ with \emphase{two} neural-networks, controlling the error.

\begin{equation*}
  \epsilon(\bX, \hat \bX ) = \sum_{i=1}^n \left\| \bx_i - \tilde{\Phi}(\Phi(\bx_i)) \right\|^2 + \text{regularization}(\Phi, \tilde{\Phi})
\end{equation*}

  - \# layers and neurons determine the \alert{\bf model complexity}
  - Need regularization to avoid \alert{\bf overfitting}
  -  Fitted with optimization tools like stochastic gradient descent
  - Require \alert{more data} and more computational \alert{resources}
  - \emphase{Interpretation questionable}
